title: Unwanted Guests and Strange Requests
description: It's a slippery slope between perfection and perversion, and Liam Adams finds himself on the wrong side of the line. Again. When an email picture piques his interest, he thinks he's found the perfect Christmas gift for Manny. Between a visit to a dungeon and the unexpected arrival of Manny's mother, Liam faces his toughest challenge yet - surviving Christmas with his dignity intact.
author: B.J. Sheppard
